author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Group getaway special in Port StephensTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Group getaway special in Port Stephens
The Retreat Port Stephens is offering corporate or leisure groups a special weekend package for $236 per person including two nights’ accommodation, breakfasts, a quad bike adventure on Australia’s biggest sand dunes and $30 to sample the craft beers at Port Stephens’s famous Murrays Brewery.
Valid for groups of at least 15 people , the package can be used by businesses for team building, sporting or special interest clubs, hens and bucks parties or for fun and unique Christmas parties.
Nestled in natural bushland 10 minutes from Nelson Bay and 2½ hours north of Sydney, The Retreat Port Stephens offers self-catering cabins and bungalows, as well as covered barbecue areas, camp fires, a pool, a games room, DVD library and a playground area. The property also backs onto the biggest sand dunes in the Southern Hemisphere, with some dunes soaring to 40m.
The weekend group getaway package is valid until April 24, 2016, except long weekends and public holidays. The $236 per person package includes two nights’ accommodation in group accommodation, a self-cook breakfast hamper, a thrilling, one-hour quad bike ride on Port Stephens’ massive dunes with Sand Dune Adventures and a $30 voucher to spend at Murrays Craft Brewery in Port Stephens.
Source:- Port Stephens
